original_text: Early the next morning, the men of the town saw that someone had destroyed Baal's altar. They saw that someone had cut down the Asherah pole. They saw that someone had burned the second bull as a sacrifice on a new altar.
korean_text: 그 성읍 사람들이 아침에 일찍이 일어나 본즉 바알의 제단이 파괴되었으며 그 곁의 아세라가 찍혔고 새로 쌓은 제단 위에 그 둘째 수소를 드렸는지라

sentences.original_text: the men of the town saw
that someone had destroyed Baal's altar
They saw that someone had cut down the Asherah pole
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누군가 아세라 상을 베어버렸다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They saw that someone had burned the second bull
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누군가 두 번째 수소를 불태웠다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: as a sacrifice on a new altar
